summary: Lycaon is a follower who patrols with his trusty Elite Wolf Guards from Whiterun to Riverwood on his trusty horse: Skyler.
descriptionHtml:
Meet Lycaon The Wolf Leader. He has his own horse that follows him everywhere. His horse has even his very own name: Skyler. His two Elite Wolf guards have their own horse too but they are not named.

Lycaon and his two elite wolf guards can be found on the main road between Riverwood and Whiterun. They patrol day and night.

Lycaon can be a follower but his guards not. When lycaon is asked to be a follower his elite guards wil keep patrolling that road. When you dismiss Lycaon, he will return to his road and the guards will follow him again.

Lycaon and his elite guards fight like rangers so their main weapon is the bow.

For the record I\'m not updating this mod cause I\'m working on an other mod right now and I don\'t have time to check up on this mod.

Feel free to comment and endorse.

Credits to Maty743 for the Bosmer Armor.
author: Glennd2
